description: This file contains C source code implementing part of the CCSP Message Bus Interface for the Test and Diagnostic module, including function implementations such as ssp_TadMbi_WaitConditionReady and ssp_TadMbi_GetHealth.

methods.name: void ssp_TadMbi_WaitConditionReady(void * bus_handle,const char * dst_component_id,char * dbus_path,char * src_component_id)
methods.description: Function stub for waiting until a condition is ready on the message bus, currently a no-op.

methods.name: int ssp_TadMbi_GetHealth(void)
methods.description: Function returning a health status indicator, currently always returns -1 indicating an unimplemented or error state.

ctags.name: ssp_TadMbi_WaitConditionReady
ctags.pattern: /^void ssp_TadMbi_WaitConditionReady(void* bus_handle, const char* dst_component_id, char* dbus_pa/
